parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I take down, pull down, depose, destroy. From kata and haireomai; to lower demolish.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A repository, granary, barn, storehouse. From apotithemi; a repository, i.e. Granary.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From sun and ago; to lead together, i.e. Collect or convene; specially, to entertain.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Wheat, grain. Also plural irregular neuter sita of uncertain derivation; grain, especially wheat.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
